item.title: Springboot Hello world
item.description: Springboot Hello World Example This is a simple Springboot application that shows how to create a simple Hello World application. Boostraping project Create a new project using Spring Initializr . Choose gradle or maven project. Choose spring web dependency. Explore the project and generate zip. Unzip the file and open the project in your favourite IDE. Creating the controller Create a controller class in com.
